title: Integrate third-party social media login using OAuth
description: Implement login using social media (Facebook, Google etc.). Users can sign in with existing accounts for a streamlined experience
submissionDetails: Implement social login using OAuth (Facebook, Google etc.). Submit code and documentation for integration

title: Develop interactive data visualization for user dashboard
description: Create engaging charts and graphs to display user data on their dashboard. Allow users to interact and explore the data
submissionDetails: Design and develop an interactive data visualization for the user dashboard. Clearly show data trends and allow user interaction

title: Develop interactive data visualization for user dashboard
description: Build another interactive data visualization for the user dashboard, focusing on a different data set.
submissionDetails: Focus on a different data set for the user dashboard visualization. Maintain consistent design and interaction style

title: Develop interactive data visualization for user dashboard
description: Develop a separate interactive data visualization for the user dashboard to represent a distinct data set. Ensure clear communication with designers
submissionDetails: Represent a distinct data set with a new interactive visualization. Collaborate with designers to ensure visual consistency
